document.discussion_title: Weather Forecast for Mon., Aug. 29 | 92.9 WLMI
document.topic_text: Sign Up for Text Alerts Daily Forecast To receive daily forecast alerts, text Forecast to 80373 . Expect up to 6 messages per week. Text STOP to cancel or text HELP for help. Message and data rates may apply. Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy are available on our texting alerts page . Top Stories
